page.title: 18Children's favourite Pets.
page.content: The most popular pets in our school are birds chickens or budgerigars,the second fish,the third cats and the fourth dogs.We found this out} by,get- ting a graph of the Infants and Juniors pets.I think fish are popular because they cost less to keep.Horses are not very popular because they cost alot to keep.We have found out the cost of all the pets in the School.The most expensive pet to keep is a horse,the least expensive pet is a fish.The horse is the most expensive pet because you have to buy hay,straw,track,brushes, hoof oil,Black Smith's bills,vet bills and you have to buy land or rent it. People pay more for their pets today than they have ever before.Many people keep dogs as there are plenty of places to walk dogs and they act as guards for the isolated houses.The most dog is the Labrador as a pet and gun-dog.
